1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Directory tree.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Subtree.DirTree
6  ( dirTrees,
7    withCurrentDirectory,
8    listDirectory,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified System.Directory                        as Dir
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Subtree.Subtree  as S
15
16-- | Create selective directory trees.
17--
18--   >>> import Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Subtree.Filter as S
19--   >>> B.printTrees O.# dirTrees [] "." [S.SubtreeR (S.sivmapId O.++ S.sivmapOmit "dist") [S.subtreeL $ S.sivmapKeep "S(*)"]]
20--   > [] "data"
21--     - "SLOC.k"
22--   > [] "Koshucode"
23--     > [] "Baala"
24--       > [] "Syntax"
25--         > [] "Attr"
26--           - "Slot.hs"
27--         > [] "Subtree"
28--           - "Subtree.hs"
29--         - "Subtree.hs"
30--         > [] "Symbol"
31--           - "Short.hs"
32--           - "Symbol.hs"
33--         - "Symbol.hs"
34--         > [] "Token"
35--           - "Section.hs"
36--         > [] "Tree"
37--           - "Split.hs"
38--       - "Syntax.hs"
39--
40dirTrees ::
41    [FilePath]                  -- ^ Exclude directory names
42    -> FilePath                 -- ^ Beginning directory
43    -> [S.SubtreePattern]       -- ^ Directory tree patterns
44    -> IO [S.Subtree FilePath]  -- ^ Result directory trees
45dirTrees exclude path ps =
46    withCurrentDirectory path $ do
47      ts <- dirTreesOne exclude ps
48      dirTreesRec exclude ts
49
50dirTreesOne :: [FilePath] -> [S.SubtreePattern] -> IO [S.Subtree String]
51dirTreesOne exclude ps =
52    do fs <- listDirectory "."
53       zs <- tree O.<#> filter (`notElem` exclude) fs
54       return $ S.subtreeOne ps zs
55    where
56      tree f = do isDir <- Dir.doesDirectoryExist f
57                  return $ case isDir of
58                             True  -> B.TreeB ps f []
59                             False -> B.TreeL f
60
61dirTreesRec :: [FilePath] -> [S.Subtree String] -> IO [S.Subtree String]
62dirTreesRec exclude ts = p O.<#++> ts where
63    p t@(B.TreeL _) = return [t]
64    p (B.TreeB ps y _) =
65        withCurrentDirectory y $ do
66           zs <- dirTreesOne exclude ps
67           case zs of
68             [] -> return []
69             _  -> do zs' <- dirTreesRec exclude zs
70                      return [B.TreeB [] y zs']
71
72-- | Same as 'Dir.withCurrentDirectory'.
73withCurrentDirectory :: FilePath -> IO a -> IO a
74withCurrentDirectory dir action =
75  B.bracket Dir.getCurrentDirectory Dir.setCurrentDirectory $ \ _ -> do
76    Dir.setCurrentDirectory dir
77    action
78
79-- | Same as 'Dir.listDirectory'.
80listDirectory :: FilePath -> IO [FilePath]
81listDirectory path = filter f <$> Dir.getDirectoryContents path where
82    f filename = filename /= "." && filename /= ".."
83
